#summary Logging and Deployment.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

jSVNServe uses for logging the [http://www.slf4j.org/ Simple Logging Facade for Java]. Depending of the used logging implementation within a project, some special bindings must be defined at deployment time.

= Logging with Apache log4j =
To use [http://logging.apache.org/log4j/ Apache log4j] for logging following maven dependencies must be defined within the pom:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
    <artifactId>jcl-over-slf4j</artifactId>
    <version>1.5.6</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
    <artifactId>jul-to-slf4j</artifactId>
    <version>1.5.6</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
    <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>
    <version>1.5.6</version>
</dependency>
}}}

= Automatic Tests =
For the automatic tests [http://logging.apache.org/log4j/ Apache log4j] is used.
